text.17_Daf, 51_Line: R. Shimon agrees that after its neck is broken it is prohibited to derive benefit from it.
text.17_Daf, 8_Line: With whom does the Mishnah accord?
text.17_Daf, 9_Line: It is R. Judah, as it is taught
text.17_Daf, 52_Line: What is his reasoning? He derives "breaking its neck" from "breaking its neck" connected to the heifer whose neck is broken.
text.17_Daf, 10_Line: The first-born of a donkey is prohibited in benefit. But R. Shimon permits.
